name: ATC Operations - Los Angeles
description:
The control of the busy skies around Los Angeles in this air traffic control game!

Game Features:
-Fast paced game play
-Control flight takeoffs and landings
-Different weather conditions and weather radar showing storms
-Airports in the game: Los Angeles International Airport (LAX/KLAX), Burbank Airport (BUR/KBUR), Long Beach Airport (LGB/KLGB)
